com.example.habitup.Model

Class UserAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.habitup.Model.UserAccount

  • public class UserAccount
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    gojeffcho The system representation of a User. Stores a unique UID identifying the user, a username that is used for login/friend requests, a real name that is displayed in the app, and optionally a photo as a display picture. encodedPhoto is what we use to be able to store images to ElasticSearch by transcoding them to Strings. We will likely separate these out into their own wrapper class for P5. Javadoc last updated 2017-11-13 by @gojeffcho.
